title: Leaverbuster???
body: I was just in a match (that we won easily..the other team surrendered) but at about 15 min my computer restarted. i came back into the game at 19 minutes no big deal, we continue to make them surrender at 20... When we get out of game it gives me a 20 minutes leaver buster??? I haven't been disconnected or had to afk in at least 20 games and i get this??? what the hell

replies.body:
You'll never receive a penalty for a single match, as it takes a trend of disconnections to get a low-priority penalty. Because you were away while your PC was restarting, it sounds like you were tagged by the AFK system, which triggered your Leaverbuster penalty.

While I cannot remove this penalty, please let me know if you have any other questions.
